ValidationRule.description: IF Meeting/Call Cancelled is checked THEN Meeting Cancellation Reason && Meeting Reschedule Status Not Null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( Meeting_Call_Cancelled__c = True, ISPICKVAL( Meeting_Cancellation_Reason__c, '' ) || ISPICKVAL( Meeting_Reschedule_status__c, ''), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Meeting Cancellation Reason and Meeting Reschedule Status should not be blank.
